intro: Urbanisol tubaeformis, commonly known as the urban isolate tubaeformis, is a rare and enigmatic plant species with unique botanical characteristics. It is typically found in highly urbanized environments, where it has adapted to limited soil nutrients and high pollution levels. The plant exhibits a tubaeformis structure, which refers to its tubular or elongated leaf shape. Its small, clustered flowers are usually pale green or white, and it produces small, dry fruits. Due to its restricted habitat and sensitivity to environmental changes, it is considered a vulnerable species in ecological studies.
